data.event: The first post office was established in 1840; however, the name of the settlement was changed from Spring Hills to Kelso when the post office was reopened in 1858.
The first post office was established in 1840; however, the name of the settlement was changed from Spring Hills to Kelso when the post office was reopened in 1858.
The post office was closed in 1861, but it was reopened after the war in 1874 by a former Civil War bugler.

event.title: was located here as early as 1849

data.event: A grocery store was located here as early as 1849, and a mill was located here as early as 1866.
